summary: Driven IT professional with 5+ years of experience in customer service, cloud computing, and cybersecurity. Passionate about sustainable tech and long-term cloud infrastructure development. Known for effective problem-solving, strategic thinking, and a commitment to continuous learning.

experience.title: Systems Administrator (In Training)
description: Self-led training across cloud systems administration and solution architecture.
Building practical labs involving Azure identity, storage, governance, and networking.
Planning long-term implementation of local cloud initiatives for Kasi-based tech advancement.

experience.title: Systems Administrator Skills Development Program
description: Participated in a 3-month program focused on cloud systems administration, solidifying knowledge of cloud concepts and deployment strategies.
Building practical labs involving Azure identity, storage, governance, and networking.
Gained proficiency in modern desktop and Linux administration.
Enhanced competencies in project management methodologies, with a focus on Agile and Waterfall frameworks.

experience.title: Call Centre Agent
description: Delivered customer service and support in high-volume environments across multiple products.
Specialized in resolving billing inquiries, product education, and various digital banking issues.
Strengthened communication, empathy, and conflict-resolution skills under pressure.

education.qualification: Microsoft Azure Fundamentals (AZ-900), IBM Project Management Fundamentals, IBM Cybersecurity Fundamentals
Higher Certificate in Information Technology: Software Development
Bachelor of Science: Information Technology (1st Year)
